thread.section_title: Excelsior Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Free Parking!
thread.title_full: Free Parking! - Review of Excelsior Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SomeGirl
title: Free Parking!
text:
Pros:
Terrific safe neighbourhood close to everything you need
Very clean
Large room
Comfortable bed
Windows that open!
Excellent fitness centre
Amazing friendly professional staff
Free parking on 81st in front of hotel/museum - stayed 50 hours with no problem - for free!
Cons:
No coffee or kettle or fridge. There's absolutely no reason they can't throw a kettle in every room.
No free wifi in room (lobby/lounge only)
Will definitely be returning. Got a terrific rate through Priceline. Not sure full price would be worth it.
